Name: To Be With You
About the game: After finally moving in with her childhood friend and long-distance boyfriend James, Alsie finds herself struggling to keep their relationship together. Can you help her save this relationship from ruin? To Be With You is a semi-autobiographical interactive visual novel exploring one woman's journey through a relationship that seems to be falling apart. Over the course of her time with James, Alsie must come to grips with her past and present if she wants to create a better future. To Be With You has multiple endings and is roughly an hour long (variable according to reading speed). Content Warnings In order of intensity of depiction, from most to least, this game contains depictions or discussions of: Emotional abuse Gaslighting Mental illness Divorce Please keep that in mind. To Be With You was commissioned by Playcrafting for PlayNYC.
